body.name: Elite Gourmet EHC-5055 Automatic Brew & Drip Coffee Maker with Pause N Serve Reusable Filter, On/Off Switch, Water Level Indicator, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: SEMI-TRANSPARENT WATER RESERVOIR holds up to 5 cups of water capacity with a level indicator to always ensure you have enough water ready for brewing.
5 CUP GLASS CARAFE for brewing the perfect quantity of hot fresh coffee for an individual or a small group of people.
PAUSE 'N SERVE allows a quick sneak of fresh coffee in the middle of brewing of you're running low on time or just need a quick coffee fix.
RE-USABLE FILTER in a swing-out basket is better for the environment and reduces additional cost of paper cone filters.
SIMPLE ON/OFF SWITCH with a Power Indicator Light, plus no special programming or settings to complicate the coffee maker function.
body.description: Start your day off right with the Elite Gourmet 5-Cup Coffeemaker. With its compact and sleek design that takes up limited counter space and fits into any nook. It is perfect for small spaces such as office kitchens, dorm rooms or recreational vehicles. Quickly and effortlessly brew your favorite coffee to jump start your day. No need to stop at a local coffee house to buy a cup of joe just to make it through the day. You can also use your own coffee grounds in the included reusable filter. Simply add fresh water for each brew. Cleanup is a cinch, all removable parts and accessories are dishwasher safe. Enjoy a cup of joe on the go with the Elite Gourmet 4-Cup Coffeemaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect coffee maker for our 5th wheel. It takes up next to no room at all. It's efficient and needs no frills. It is on the slower to brew side if I had to find something to fuss about. Overall worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars basic, works well, no dribble issues, brews quick, easy to clean and manage, NO issues
reviews.reviewText: Huh, mixed reviews. Well, I have NO issues with this brewer. From start to finish, no issues.--Plug in.--I fill the reservoir to the max (5 cups) with cold water--I add 5 TBS of ground coffee to the filter basket.--Make sure drip is over the coffee--Turn on via simple ON/OFF switch--Brews quickly.--POURING? no problem. Never ever a spill or dribble. EVER.--5 cups fills a couple of mugs. I dont let the coffee sit on the burner as there is no warming option (nor expected one on this size coffee maker).--Filter basket is easy to clean. I tap the spent grounds on side of garbage can, then run the filter under faucet to clear out rest. Easy peasy. Could use a paper filter if that seems complicated.--Maybe make another pot if I need it :), or I store it away until next time. I happen to have a Kcup machine, capsule machine, French press, pour over brewers, a large capacity drip brewer, and this 5 cupper. I dont have everything sitting out. I tend to grab for a kcup or for this small brewer. Just works for me.Glad I bought this. I was in the mood for drip brewed coffee, and didnt want to use my 12 cupper. My old 5 cupper was long gone, so I decided to just order this. At sub $20 I thought it a reasonable purchase. Lately I have only been making drip coffee in this, and it has been wonderful. Nice to use up some bags of coffee that I had been ignoring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short on Space? This is a Coffee Lover's Delight!
reviews.reviewText: The Elite Gourmet EHC-5055 Automatic Brew & Drip Coffee Maker takes the morning coffee routine to new heights. Despite its small stature, this sleek and efficient coffee maker boasts a range of features that make it a standout addition to any kitchen.One of my favorite aspects is the Pause N Serve feature. It allows me to sneak a cup of coffee mid-brew without any mess. Perfect for those moments when I just can't wait for the entire pot to finish. The water level indicator is a thoughtful touch that takes the guesswork out of brewing. It's easy to see when it's time to refill, preventing any mishaps and ensuring a consistent brew strength. The simple On/Off switch makes operation a breeze. It's intuitive and easy to use, and the light is especially helpful for those dark early mornings when functionality is key. I purchased this coffee maker for its sleek compact design to fit on my countertop without taking up precious space.One recommended improvement would be to design the carafe so it doesn't spill over no matter how fast or slow you pour the joe into your mug. Another improvement would be to have a retractable cord to round out the powerhouse of features this little coffee champion provides.Cheers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, an excellent purchase but . . .
reviews.reviewText: This review is based on one week's usage--take that for what its worth. It is effective, it heats the water and passes it through the ground coffee beans in the filter. The filter is nice; no paper filter needed. It is as advertised--a basic, functioning water heating device.One drawback is the lack of auto shutoff. While it is sold as a "feature": "no special programming or settings to complicate the coffee maker function". Right. It is so simple it doesn't shut off by itself. Understand that, and you should be very happy with this purchase. Go to bed forgetting to shut it off and the pic is what you'll wake up to.I purchased this to travel out of town for a couple of weeks and it is well worth the money for that purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Makes a decent cup of coffee
reviews.reviewText: I only drink one cup of coffee per day and bought this little pot to get away from using pods. For $20.00 it's definitely a "you get what you pay for" product. Easy to use and clean, but very delicate and requires gentle handling. The black coating on the warming plate is already coming up in places after only two uses. That said, would recommend it for occasional use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My very old & inexpensive coffee pot was giving my coffee a 'plastic' taste so I junked it and bought this one. The improved taste was immediately noticeable. I was not sure how I felt about the 'arm' you have to swing over the coffee when you start to brew and then again when you are done but I adapted to it right away. You can't beat the price and I would recommend this little pot to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had many different styles of coffee makers and missed the old fashioned coffee pot coffee after having a cup at my neighbors. I didn’t have much money to spend and found this very affordable model. I just had my first cup of coffee in it and am so so happy! It’s delicious! I highly recommend this coffee maker. The price is great , you don’t need to buy filters and works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic but reliable
reviews.reviewText: Basic and cheap, but it makes coffee as expected. The only issue I have is that there is significant loss of water from the reservoir to the pot. I fill the reservoir to the 5 cup line and get 4 cups of coffee.

The Max Matic Coffee Maker has undoubtedly exceeded my expectations in delivering a rich and flavorful coffee experience. Its sleek and modern design adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen countertop. The setup process was effortless, and the user-friendly controls made brewing coffee a breeze. The 12-cup capacity is perfect for entertaining guests or ensuring a steady supply of coffee throughout the day.The coffee maker's advanced brewing technology consistently produces a smooth and aromatic brew, satisfying my taste buds every morning. What impressed me most is the programmable feature, allowing me to wake up to the delightful aroma of freshly brewed coffee.Furthermore, the carafe's thermal insulation maintains the coffee's temperature for an extended period, eliminating the need for reheating. Cleaning is a snap with the removable filter basket and drip tray.Overall, the Max Matic Coffee Maker is a fantastic addition to any coffee lover's arsenal, combining style, convenience, and exceptional performance.

I like the fact that it has nothing digital on it and a reusable filter basket. A simple small coffee maker with an on off switch. I have it plugged into a smart plug and can tell it to start as soon as I wake up. Makes 2 mugs of coffee.
The coffee maker works but the burner/heater material is peeling off and sticking to to bottom of the coffee pot.
Well designed. Flavourable coffee. nice having the grounds basket, just quick wash and back in business, no paper filters required.
